.. _api:

``phydmslib`` API
======================

Installation of `phydms`_ installs the ``phydmslib`` package, which provides the `Python`_ API.

See the :ref:`genindex` for a listing of all functions / classes / constants in the `Python`_ API.

See the :ref:`modindex` for a listing of all modules in the API.

This API can be imported into `Python`_ as for other packages (e.g. ``import phydmslib.treelikelihood``).

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   phydmslib
